title: Economy, Capitalism, 2020 Candidate Marianne Williamson
itunes:title: Economy, Capitalism, 2020 Candidate Marianne Williamson
description:
Panel guests: Lauren Claffey, Republican Strategist, Managing Director at Hamilton Place Strategies and Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist and Senior Advisor at Rokk Solutions.

Marianne Williamson, Democratic presidential candidate and best-selling author and activist discusses her presidential campaign, the economy, trade, reparations, capitalism, and her Department of Peace proposal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
